self.title: CDISC SDTM Vaccination Evidence Source Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the source of information regarding the subject's vaccination status.
name: Vaccination Evidence Source
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Vaccination Evidence Source Terminology

terms.definition: A mark left (usually on the skin) by the healing of injured tissue.
An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information.
The collecting, abstracting, and coding of printed or written information for future reference.
